column5: well, this weekend im gunna go head out the the locks again but this time for perch and bass (yes i've personally caught them while going for whitefish). i dont have a question about the perch or bass other than is there any recommended spots for perch at the locks? my main question though is about the whitefish, when do they come back in to the western pier? and does anybody know where they are right now? oh also i've heard/seen walleye commin outta the ice by the western pier in the winter, does anyone know when they start migrating to there?      thanks,   JP
